view.message:
What is your name? Hannah Higgins, and I am from St. Louis, MO.

What is your quest? I am a junior. Once I graduate I want to go into human resources for a company and help with the recruitment and interview process.

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is blue and I am obsessed with playing pickleball right now.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? Some questions are just hard! What question would you like to be able to answer at the end of this course? In other words, what would you like to learn about marketing research? I would like to learn the importance of marketing research for companies and also ways to avoid errors in research.

What is your name? Broque Echols, and I am from Lake of the Ozarks, MO!

What is your quest? I am a senior finishing up my last full year here at MU, Im studying Marketing and hopefully trying to start a job in sales or finance upon graduation.  

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is Blue, I just bought my first adult car and it is a subtle ocean blue color.  

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? One major takeaway I want from this course is the ability to better understand data and the best ways to collect / present findings.

What is your name? Olivia Remissong and I'm from Chicago!

What is your quest?  I am senior and after I graduate would love to be working for a creative ad agency or digital marketing firm! I'm interested in fashion and travel so ideally I want to work within those realms.

What is your favorite color? I took a gap year after I graduated high school and lived in Poland for a year before I came to Mizzou.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I want to get a good baseline understanding of marketing research and learn how to use it to my benefit. I would also like to learn how to tie marketing research into my creative projects so I can round out my skills and portfolio.

What is your name? Kaitlyn Dunfee, and I am from St. Charles, IL.

What is your quest? I am a junior and when I graduate I hope to have a job in marketing analytics.

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is pink, and I enjoy playing volleyball.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I would like to learn about how market research plays a role in the decision-making of companies.  I would also like to learn how companies go about doing this research.

What is your name? Kyleigh Polston and I'm from High Hill, MO.

What is your quest? I am finishing up my senior year this semester, after graduation, I would ideally like to work as a brand strategist/manager.

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is purple and I have a pet snail named Mango.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? Some questions are just hard! What question would you like to be able to answer at the end of this course? In other words, what would you like to learn about marketing research? This semester I would like to learn more about researching current market trends and predicting future trends, and how these influence the success of various products and services.

What is your name? Skylar Bloch and I am from Edwardsville Illinois!

What is your quest? I am a junior but I am graduating a semester early so technically its my second to last semester. After I graduate I would like to be a medical sales representative at a big medical sales company. 

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is pink and I am allergic to gluten and dairy!

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? In this course I would like to learn the best steps to follow in order to most effectively do marketing research. I like having set rules and steps when doing research.

What is your name? Kayla Harmon, and I am from O'Fallon, MO

What is your quest? I am a senior technically. I will be graduating in December after finishing my final semester online in the fall. I am hoping to work in digital marketing in the sports industry after I graduate.

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is blue and I love anything and everything hockey/NHL. It would be a dream to do the marketing for an NHL team in the future. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I want to be able to understand how marketing research is beneficial in all aspects of marketing. I would also like to learn the best ways to collect data depending on the type of company.

What is your name? Shelbie Spinner, and I am from Centralia, IL

What is your quest? I am a Junior and am studying Marketing. After graduation, I am open to any possibilities but am interested in being a marketing consultant. 

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is royal blue and I love to travel. I will be studying abroad in Portugal over spring break and in Italy over summer break. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? Some questions are just hard! What question would you like to be able to answer at the end of this course? In other words, what would you like to learn about marketing research? I am hoping to better understand how market research impacts companies and am hoping to learn some things for my future market research internship in the fall.

What is your name? I am Austin Gast, and I am from St. Louis, Missouri

What is your quest? What year are you (e.g., junior, senior)? What would you like to do at the end of your program (e.g., sales agent, marketing consultant, etc.)? I am currently a Senior, and I would like to get into Sales and Real Estate. 

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is probably Red or Black, and I love to workout and play hockey. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I would like to know the importance of Marketing research and how it can help me in the fields that I want to go into.

What is your name? State your name and where you are from

My name is Dawson Owen, I am from Kansas City, Missouri.

What is your quest? What year are you (e.g., junior, senior)? What would you like to do at the end of your program (e.g., sales agent, marketing consultant, etc.)?

I am currently a junior. I would like to be a part of a digital marketing team for a corporate company.

What is your favorite color? Tell an interesting fact, hobby, or experience you have.

My favorite color is blue and something interesting about me is that I can play the piano.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? Some questions are just hard! What question would you like to be able to answer at the end of this course? In other words, what would you like to learn about marketing research?

I would like to learn how to combine my research with deeper findings through analytics for my presentations.

What is your name? Lilly Bettag, St. Louis 

What is your quest? I am a Junior. I wanna go into sales not sure what path I wanna take yet. 

What is your favorite color? My Favorite color is yellow and I just finished game of thrones....crazzzyyy ending! 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? One thing I would like to takeaway from this class is a better understanding of problem solving in a business and understand how market research impacts how a business operates.

What is your name? Stefan Bramwell, Kansas City, MO

What is your quest? Senior, Marketing major, I have a sales role after graduation.

What is your favorite color? Blue. I enjoy working out and watching sports

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? What is the best way to collect data and then present said data.

What is your name? My name is Shelby Erickson and I am from Liberty, Missouri. (Just outside Kansas City!)

What is your quest? I am a junior and after I graduate, the industry I really hope to be in is the business side of fashion. 

What is your favorite color? My favorite color varies but currently, it's gold. An interesting hobby I have is I collect comic books; I'm a big fan of Marvel! 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I want to learn why companies use certain marketing strategies; how they determine the most effective way to market a product or service.

What is your name? Nathan Cowie, and I am from St. Louis

What is your quest? I am a Senior in my last semester, I am studying Marketing going for my sales certificate and would like to get a job in sales after graduation.

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is Navy Blue and I love playing golf.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? Something that I would like is how marketing research can be used to make myself a more effective salesman.

What is your name? My name is Alina Riebel and I am from Dallas, Texas.

What is your quest? I am a senior and at the end of my program, I would like to be in sales. 

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is blue. An interesting fact about me is that I lived in Germany until I was 15 and moved to the U.S. when my dad took a job in Texas.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? By the end of this course, I want to know what is the best way to collect data to avoid as many errors as possible.

What is your name? 

My name is Ashley Schaefer and I am from Frankenstein, Missouri. 

What is your quest? 

I am a senior graduating this May.  I am unsure of what I want to do, but anticipate something sales related.

What is your favorite color? 

My favorite color is yellow and I love riding my dirt bike/motorcycle.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? 

I would like to learn how to properly research information and how to use that in a professional workplace setting.

What is your name? Tim Suter and I was born and raised in St.Louis

What is your quest? I am a senior studying business marketing. After graduation I would like to become a sales rep for a technology company.

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is light blue and and a hobby of mine is long distance running and watching sports.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? Some questions are just hard! What question would you like to be able to answer at the end of this course? In other words, what would you like to learn about marketing research? One thing I would like to take away from this class is how to narrow down your target audience and be a better prospector.

What is your name? Caroline Smith and I am from Saint Louis, MO!

What is your quest? I am a senior. After graduation I would like to do something in marketing or sales. I want to work with people!

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is blue and an interesting fact about me is that I am a triplet. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I want what i learn in marketing research to benefit me in my career and be able to use the skills i learn to be successful in the work force.

What is your name? Erik Swenson and I am from the St. Louis area.

What is your quest? I am a senior. Once I graduate in I want to get a job in inside sales.

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is probably blue and I play racquetball.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? Some questions are just hard! What question would you like to be able to answer at the end of this course? In other words, what would you like to learn about marketing research? I would like to learn more about marketing research and general, as well as how to best collect marketing data.

What is your name? My name is Grant Modglin and I am from Weldon Spring, Missouri about 35 minutes outside of St. Louis.

What is your quest? I'm currently a senior marketing major. After college I hope to find a job doing some sort of product marketing or sales.

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is blue and over summer I worked as a marketing intern for a fast growing fiber optic internet company called Gateway Fiber in Saint Charles.

What would you like to learn about marketing research? I would like to learn about the most effective ways to conduct market research and different strategies for analyzing and implementing changes discovered from the research.

What is your name? My name is Lauren Freesmeier, and I'm from St. Charles, Mo.

What is your quest? I am a senior and I am pursuing a career in sales, preferably in the healthcare industry.

What is your favorite color? A great experience of mine was living and working at the Lake of Ozarks the past two summers. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I would like to learn how to pull data and look at market trends.

What is your name? Rachel Byars and I am from St. Louis.

What is your quest? I am a senior, and I want to work in the analytical side of marketing after graduation.

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is light blue, and I am obsessed with anything involving skincare.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? This semester I would like to learn how to most effectively find and present data to make it most helpful for the company I am working for.

What is your name? Jack Politte. I’m from St. Louis, MO!
What is your quest? I am currently a Junior and would like to go into sales once I’ve graduated.

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is green and I enjoy playing lacrosse for the Mizzou club team! I also enjoy fishing!
What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I would like to learn more about how critical marketing research can be for companies and how it impacts decision making for said company.

What is your name? I'm Chela, and I'm from a tiny town in southern IL called Valmeyer. 

What is your quest? I am a senior studying marketing. I currently intern with Veterans United and plan to go full-time after graduating. I would like to eventually find my way into consumer research.

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is pink, I have a cat named Oli, and I like to listen to music. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I would like to learn about the different aspects that come with being a marketing researcher, so I can know whether it is actually something I want to do in my career.

What is your name? Elise Finn and I'm from Kansas City, MO

What is your quest? I'm a senior in the marketing program. I'm hoping to go into account management at an ad agency

What is your favorite color?  My favorite color is green and I love to hike

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I'd like to learn how marketing research can help me in my future career

What is your name? Alexis Daigle and I'm from Wisconsin!

What is your quest? I'm a junior and I'd love to go into brand management.

What is your favorite color? An interesting fact about me is that I used to curl in a rec league when I was in high school.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I would like to know how companies measure the results from the changes they make after doing market research.
